item.title: LuckyChicken2
item.description: game introduction A small chicken fly to a high building,and now it want to go down,it go down by step and step, but building is too high to get floor,can you help it,done it please. You will get a lot of fun and surprise, you can do it on your boring time. game shotscreen contact athor: semgilo email: 9737935@qq.com phone: +8618150133345

item.title: 快刀忍者
item.description: 游戏介绍 一款强度适中，不伤肝的休闲益智小游戏，简单而不简单，打击感十足，画面精美，持久耐看，中小年值得拥有。发扬小忍者在保卫森林的精神。陪伴您度过快乐的每个时刻。 游戏截图 联系方式 athor: semgilo email: semgilo@gmail.com phone: +8618150133345

item.title: Expressionism os ninja
item.description: introduction a funny mini game which you can play a day and a day, and you never want to remove it. shotscreen contact athor: semgilo email: 9737935@qq.com phone: +8618150133345
